projects.information: A project is a group of schemas, datasets, and scenarios that can be shared with others or remain private.
projects.name: Name

general.introduction: Need some mock data to test your app? Mocker lets you generate up to 1,000 rows of realistic test data in CSV, JSON, SQL, and Excel formats.

schemas.information: A database schema is (generally) broadly divided into two categories: physical database schema that defines how the data-like files are actually stored; and logical database schema, which describes all the logical constraints -- including integrity, tables and views -- applied on the stored data.
schemas.name: Name
